attributes.action: harder prison sentences and deportation for non English!!
attributes.additional_details:
Has we all know in the UK sex gangs are becoming a bigger issue all the time.


We want the government to give out HARDER time for these monsters not just a few year abuse and rape stays with the victims for life!

We want the government to deport NON-English members of these sex gangs they have no place in this country and why should hard working people of this amazing country who offer people a better life pay for them to get 3 meals a day and a warm cell!!

The time to act is now!
